SELECT seq ,cc_name ,useNY ,delNY ,cc_key ,ccg_seq ,createDate ,modiDate FROM cc WHERE 1=1
AND useNY LIKE 1 AND useNY LIKE 2
AND delNY LIKE 1 AND delNY LIKE 2
AND createDate BETWEEN #{shStartDate} AND #{shEndDate} AND modiDate BETWEEN #{shStartDate AND #{shEndDate}
AND cc_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
SELECT a.cc_name ,a.useNY ,delNY ,a.cc_key ,a.ccg_seq ,a.createDate ,a.modiDate FROM cc WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
SELECT seq , cc_name , ccg_seq ,cc_key FROM cc WHERE 1=1 AND useNY = 2
